description: This file defines a React functional component 'SummarySidebar' that displays expense summaries including a donut chart and category breakdown. It processes expense data, calculates totals and category-wise amounts, and renders visual representations and summaries.

methods.name: SummarySidebar({ expenses })
methods.description: React component that displays expense summaries with a donut chart and category details.

parameters.name: expenses
parameters.description: List of expense objects, each with at least 'amount' and 'category' properties.
